text: ane ame ketalaka lokone temani nikata rakhya hata, jemane temana agala-pachalana karyo, temani same sundara banavi rakhya hata ane temana mate pana allahano te nirnaya lagu tha'i gayo, je nirnaya temana karata pahelana loko mate tha'i gayo hato, je jinnato ane manusya mate hato, ni:Sanka te'o nukasana uthavanara hata
